original_text: At that time, a man will let people kill his own brother. A father will let people kill his own child. Children will be against their parents. They will even ask people to kill their parents.
korean_text: 장차 형제가 형제를, 아버지가 자식을 죽는 데에 내주며 자식들이 부모를 대적하여 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: a man will let people kill his own brother
A father will let people kill his own child
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지가 자기 자식을 죽이도록 사람들에게 내어줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: Children will be against their parents
They will even ask people to kill their parents
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 그들은 부모를 죽여달라고 사람들에게 요청할 것이다
